name: Heisters
description:
Sneak or go aggressive, the bank is due to move some money.

Get in and take it all for your self.

Controls:

w - forwardse - pick up objecta - leftg - drop objects - backwardsmouse1 (right click) - swap between
third person and first persond - rightv - toggle third person shoulderspace - jumpmouse0 (Left click) - fireduck - left ctrl (hold to crawl)r - reloadshift - sprintaplha1 (1) - equip/remove weapon

Recomendations: 

designed for 1920 x 1080 resolution
